node.title: The rise of WebVR (and how Aframe can help fill the content drought)
node.description: How could the latest advancements in WebVR help create the type of content VR really needs right now.

node.title: Rendering your first AR object with AWS Sumerian (1/2)
node.description: How to set up your projects and scenes on AWS Sumerian.
